content: Well, that’s a nice selection from the RECENT past… but http://jick.net/~jess/www/jhb-map.html shows the root layer of my “homebuilt bookmarks tree” that I assembled in the 1990s, before Google rendered such projects pointless. Before that there were no browsers. Before THAT there was no Web! Some of us go back to long before there was even ARPAnet. Who remembers Jnet? :-)
